title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1800.5 - Transfer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1800.5 - Transfer

State Regulations

Inmates will be given preliminary screening at reception
centers to determine if they meet the statutory eligibility criteria for
participation in the shock incarceration program. Selected inmates may then be
transferred to designated shock incarceration facilities for final screening
and approval for program participation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1800.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
